data.actual_result: The view from the back camera is blurred and will not re-focus
data.expected_result: Whatever is in front of your back camera! Sharp and in focus!
data.short_description: Switching camera view makes the shot blurry [Might be OnePlus specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the + in any chat you'd like to share a picture with - go to the camera tab while staying in discord - switch from the back camera to the front camera and back - observe
